abstract: Zdravko Kuzmanović (Serbian Cyrillic: Здравко Кузмановић, born 22 September 1987) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Internazionale in the Italian Serie A. He represented Serbia in the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Zdravko Kuzmanović (Serbian Cyrillic: Здравко Кузмановић, born 22 September 1987) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Internazionale in the Italian Serie A. He represented Serbia in the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
name: Kuzmanović, Zdravko
Zdravko Kuzmanović
